name: Earth Allegiance: Defender of Celestial Sphere
name_original: Earth Allegiance: Defender of Celestial Sphere
description:
Earth Allegiance : Defender of Celestial Sphere is a 3D-RTS tower defense game in space the goal is simple defend the 88 known constellations from the invading forces before it reaches earth.

EA : IS HEAVILY UNDER DEVELOPMENT
